Element.Name: Customization identifier
Element.Description: Identifies the specification of content and rules that apply to the transaction.

Element.Name: Profile identifier
Element.Description: Identifies the BII profile or business process context in which the transaction appears.

Element.Name: Response identifier
Element.Description: An transaction instance must contain an identifier. The identifier enables positive referencing the document instance for various purposes including referencing between transactions that are part of the same process.

Element.Name: Response issue date
Element.Description: The date on which the transaction instance was issued.

Element.Name: Response issue time
Element.Description: The time at which the transaction instance was issued.

Element.Name: Response textual notes
Element.Description: Used to make any comments or instructions relevant to the response, including the date that the reported decision becomes effective.

Element.Name: Electronic address
Element.Description: A response may contain the party electronic address. The address can be of any format and the format should be identified in the message.

Attribute.Name: Electronic address identifier identification scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: The identification scheme identifier of the Electronic address identifier

Element.Name: Party identifier
Element.Description: It should be possible to specify the identifier or identifiers for the party.

Attribute.Name: Sender identifier identification scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: The identification scheme identifier of the Sender identifier

Element.Name: Party name
Element.Description: The name of the party sending the response.

Element.Name: Electronic address
Element.Description: A response may contain the party electronic address. The address can be of any format and the format should be identified in the message.

Attribute.Name: Electronic address identifier identification scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: The identification scheme identifier of the Electronic address identifier

Element.Name: Party identifier
Element.Description: It should be possible to specify the identifier or identifiers for the party.

Attribute.Name: Receiver identifier identification scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: The identification scheme identifier of the Receiver identifier

Element.Name: Party name
Element.Description: The name of the party receiving the response.

Element.Name: Coded decision
Element.Description: A code for the description of the response to the transaction document. AP= Accepted, RE = Rejected, UN/Cefact 4343 Response type code

Attribute.Name: Response code identifier identification scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: The identification scheme identifier of the Response code identifier.

Element.Name: Document identifier
Element.Description: Identifies the document being referred to.

Attribute.Name: Document identifier identification scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: The identification scheme identifier of the document identifier

Element.Name: Document version
Element.Description: The version of the document that has been identified with the document identifier.
